Others: Jackson Chourio is hitting.278 with 19 home runs and 70 RBI for the Milwaukee Brewers.
Chourio has a 1-for-1 career record against Colorado Rockies starter Ty Blach.
Chourio has recorded a base hit in 66.7% of his games this season (82 times), with 36 multi-hit games (29.3%).
He has homered in 14.6% of his games this season (123 contests), going deep in 3.9% of his trips to home plate.
In 44.7% of his games this season, Chourio has scored (55 times). He’s also notched 11 games with multiple runs (8.9%).
He has tallied at least one RBI 33.3% of the time (41 times), including 20 multi-RBI outings (16.3%). He has also accounted for three or more of his team’s runs in six contests.
In 56.9% of his games this season, Chourio has gone down on strikes (70 times). He’s also had 23 games with multiple strikeouts (18.7%).
